010package imagingbook.pub.histogram;
011
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.gui.NewImage;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015
016public class HistogramPlot {
017        // TODO: make HistogramPlot extend ImagePlus
018        
019        static final int BACKGROUND = 255;
020
021    int width =  256;
022    int height = 128;
023    int base = height-1;
024    int paintValue = 0;
025        ImagePlus hist_img;
026        ImageProcessor ip;
027        int[] H = new int[256];
028        
029        public HistogramPlot(int[] h, String title) {
030                this(Util.normalizeHistogram(h), title);
031        }
032        
033        public HistogramPlot(double[] nH, String title) {
034                createHistogramImage(title);
035                // nH must be a normalized histogram of length 256
036                for (int i = 0; i < nH.length; i++) {
037                        H[i] = (int) Math.round(height * nH[i]);
038                }
039                draw();
040                //show();
041        }
042        
043        public HistogramPlot(PiecewiseLinearCdf cdf, String title) {
044                // TODO: needed?
045                createHistogramImage(title);
046                // nH must be a normalized histogram of length 256
047                for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
048                        H[i] = (int) Math.round(height * cdf.getCdf(i));
049                }
050                draw();
051                //show();
052        }
053        
054        void createHistogramImage(String title) {
055                if (title == null)
056                        title = "Histogram Plot";
057                hist_img  = NewImage.createByteImage(title,width,height,1,0);
058                ip = hist_img.getProcessor();
059        ip.setValue(BACKGROUND);
060        ip.fill();
061        }
062        
063        void draw() {
064                ip.setValue(0);
065                ip.drawLine(0,base,width-1,base);
066                ip.setValue(paintValue);
067                int u = 0;
068                for (int i=0; i<H.length; i++) {
069                        int k = H[i];
070                        if (k > 0){
071                        ip.drawLine(u, base-1, u, base-k);
072                        }
073                        u = u + 1;
074                }
075        }
076        
077        void update() {
078                hist_img.updateAndDraw();
079        }
080        
081        public void show() {
082                hist_img.show();
083        update();
084        }
085        
086        void makeRamp() {
087                for (int i = 0; i < H.length; i++) {
088                        H[i] = i;
089                }
090        }
091        
092        void makeRandom() {
093                for (int i = 0; i < H.length; i++) {
094                        H[i] = (int)(Math.random() * height);
095                }
096        }
097        
098    //----- static methods ----------------------
099        
100//    public static void showHistogram(ImageProcessor ip, String title) {
101//              int[] Ha = ip.getHistogram();
102//              HistogramPlot hp = new HistogramPlot(Util.normalizeHistogram(Ha), title);
103//              hp.show();
104//      }
105
106//      public static void showCumHistogram(ImageProcessor ip, String title) {
107//              int[] Ha = ip.getHistogram();
108//              HistogramPlot hp = new HistogramPlot(Util.Cdf(Ha), title);
109//              hp.show();
110//      }
111
112}
